comments.body: What happens after installation when clang is builtin? Won't there be a hard-coded include to the build directory in this case?
For better or worse we do not install builtin_clang if this is what you meant.
The 2 branch of the If look extremely similar.  Wouldn't be clearer to have a single call to ExternalProject_Add tweak via variables?
@bellenot tried merging both into a single branch but did not work for some reason.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@    set(_clad_build_type Release)
  endif()
  ExternalProject_Add(
    clad
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/vgvassilev/clad.git
